SELECT c.owner_name,c.area,a.heating_unit_price,b.discount_start_date,b.discount_end_date,b.rate FROM heating_pay a LEFT JOIN heating_discount_type b ON a.corp_id = b.corp_id LEFT JOIN house c ON a.house_num = c.house_num WHERE a.house_num = #{house_num} AND a.community_id = #{community_id}
